data.conditions: Happy Sunday! As the weekend unfolds look for morning sunshine to decrease as cloud cover moves into the valley as the day progresses. Light to moderate winds will be trending out of the WSW at 10-15 MPH with moderate gusting into the 20 MPH range. Warming temperatures will reach the low 30's up at the Corbet's Cabin waffle factory while the valley floor will reach the high 30's by late afternoon. Cold morning conditions will ski fast and continue to soften as the day warms up. Your Sunday fun day starts with a trip to the Top Of The World and finishes with a choose your own adventure down Rendezvous' finest! Stay safe out there. - MB

forecast.day_comments: Snow, mainly before 5pm.  High near 37. Wind chill values between 25 and 30. East southeast wind 5 to 13 mph becoming west in the morning. Winds could gust as high as 26 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 100%. Total daytime snow accumulation of around an inch possible.
forecast.night_comments: Snow likely, mainly after 4am.  Patchy fog before 8pm.  Otherwise, mostly cloudy, with a low around 28. Wind chill values between 21 and 26. South southwest wind around 8 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
